# ig

Minimal R client for interacting with Instagram's public API.

## Installation

You can install *ig* from [Github](https://github.com) with:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("mkearney/ig")
```

## Example

Access Instagram's *`users/self`* endpoint.

```{r example}
## get data from users
me <- ig::ig_users_self()

## view data
me
```
